item.title: Yasi (Yet another scheme implementation)
item.description: Yasi is my own implementation of the Scheme dialect of the Lisp programming language, written from scratch in C++. Roadmap REPL Loop Load and execute files Basic arithmetic operations (+-*/) Print statement Input statement Variables Conditional statements Functions Lambda functions Lists Macros Load and execute libraries Mathematical functions (sin, cos, tan, etc.) Compilation to bytecode Bytecode execution Bytecode optimization Tail call optimization Error handling (WIP) Garbage collection Windows Support
